languages.text: "Заткнись. Что за дурацкая привычка болтать с питомцами. Скорее начнем развлекаться с {mf|ним|ней} — старая игрушка уже почти издохла, ее боль стала пресной".
"That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."
languages.original_text: "Заткнись. Что за дурацкая привычка болтать с питомцами. Скорее начнем развлекаться с {mf|ним|ней} — старая игрушка уже почти издохла, ее боль стала пресной".

traits.locale_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead — the old plaything is nearly spent, and its pain has grown stale."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

traits.locale_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead — the old plaything is nearly spent, and its pain has grown stale."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

traits.locale_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

traits.locale_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

traits.locale_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: « Ça suffit. Cette manie de parler aux animaux est ridicule. Jouons avec {mf|lui|elle}, plutôt : notre ancien jouet est à bout et ne produira plus de douleur suffisante. »
languages.original_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit. Cette manie de parler aux animaux est ridicule. Jouons avec {mf|lui|elle}, plutôt : notre ancien jouet est à bout et ne produira plus de douleur suffisante. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: “行了行了，别说了，你和宠物说话的习惯真该改改。现在，咱们应该和{mf|他|她}好好玩玩了。这么说吧，我们的旧玩具已经快玩坏了，它的痛苦也变得越来越无聊了。”
languages.original_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."

traits.locale_text: “行了行了，别说了，你和宠物说话的习惯真该改改。现在，咱们应该和{mf|他|她}好好玩玩了。这么说吧，我们的旧玩具已经快玩坏了，它的痛苦也变得越来越无聊了。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: 「そのくらいにしておけ。ペットに話しかけるなど馬鹿げている。そろそろこいつで遊ぶ時だ。前のオモチャは使い古してしまって、新鮮な苦痛が失われてしまったからな」
languages.original_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."

traits.locale_text: 「そのくらいにしておけ。ペットに話しかけるなど馬鹿げている。そろそろこいつで遊ぶ時だ。前のオモチャは使い古してしまって、新鮮な苦痛が失われてしまったからな」
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: "Schluss jetzt damit. Es ist doch lächerlich, mit Haustieren zu sprechen. Wir sollten lieber mit {mf|ihm|ihr} etwas spielen – das alte Spielzeug ist mittlerweile fad und sein Schmerz schal geworden."
languages.original_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."

traits.locale_text: "Schluss jetzt damit. Es ist doch lächerlich, mit Haustieren zu sprechen. Wir sollten lieber mit {mf|ihm|ihr} etwas spielen – das alte Spielzeug ist mittlerweile fad und sein Schmerz schal geworden."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: «Ya has dicho suficiente. Esa costumbre que tienes de hablar con las mascotas es ridícula. Lo que hay que hacer es empezar ya a jugar con {mf|él|ella}: el juguete viejo está casi roto, y su dolor me sabe rancio».
languages.original_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."

traits.locale_text: «Ya has dicho suficiente. Esa costumbre que tienes de hablar con las mascotas es ridícula. Lo que hay que hacer es empezar ya a jugar con {mf|él|ella}: el juguete viejo está casi roto, y su dolor me sabe rancio».
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM

languages.text: "Yeter artık. Şu evcil hayvanlarla konuşma alışkanlığın inanılır gibi değil. Artık bu {mf|oğlanla|kızla} oynayalım bari. Eski oyuncağımızın hiç hâli kalmadı, acısının da eğlencesi kaçtı."
languages.original_text: "That's enough out of you. This habit of talking to pets is ridiculous. It is time we toyed with {mf|him|her} instead: the old plaything is nearly spent and its pain has grown stale."

traits.locale_text: "Yeter artık. Şu evcil hayvanlarla konuşma alışkanlığın inanılır gibi değil. Artık bu {mf|oğlanla|kızla} oynayalım bari. Eski oyuncağımızın hiç hâli kalmadı, acısının da eğlencesi kaçtı."
traits.speaker: DrukhariLeaderM
